title: Can a computer enthusiast build a supercomputer using mobile phone Octa-core processors? If yes, how many such cores are required? - Quora

response.answer_text: Supercomputers require different architecture to work on and Mobile phone processors are not designed for that environment. here Architecture means a base or a platform for the Functioning of the OS or Applications. e.g. intel came up with Comet Lake processors recently and then is upgrading to better ones with time. and AMD has zen 3+ right now. So to answer your question, NO you cannot use mobile [hone processors to build a supercomputer
